storyTitle: As Scheduler, I want to assign shift templates to employees to achieve efficient schedule creation

testCases.title: Assign shift template to single employee without conflicts
preconditions: User is logged in with Scheduler role
At least one employee exists in the system
At least one shift template is available
Selected employee has no existing shifts for the target date
Employee schedule assignment page is accessible

steps.action: Navigate to employee schedule assignment page
steps.expectedResult: Schedule assignment form is displayed with employee selection dropdown, shift template dropdown, and date picker fields

steps.action: Select one employee from the employee dropdown list
steps.expectedResult: Employee is selected and displayed in the form without validation errors

steps.action: Select a shift template from the shift template dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Shift template is selected and shift details (start time, end time, duration) are displayed

steps.action: Select a specific date using the date picker
steps.expectedResult: Date is selected and displayed in the form, inputs accepted without validation errors

steps.action: Click the Submit or Assign button to submit the assignment
steps.expectedResult: System processes the request, shift is assigned successfully, and confirmation message is displayed indicating successful assignment

steps.action: Verify the assigned shift appears in the employee's schedule view
steps.expectedResult: The newly assigned shift is visible in the employee's schedule with correct date, time, and shift template details

postconditions: Shift template is successfully assigned to the employee for the specified date
Assignment is saved in the EmployeeSchedules table
Employee schedule reflects the new shift assignment
No conflicts exist in the employee's schedule

testCases.title: Prevent overlapping shift assignments for the same employee
preconditions: User is logged in with Scheduler role
An employee exists in the system
Employee already has a shift assigned for a specific date and time (e.g., 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM)
At least one shift template exists that would overlap with the existing shift
Employee schedule assignment page is accessible

steps.action: Navigate to employee schedule assignment page
steps.expectedResult: Schedule assignment form is displayed

steps.action: Select the employee who already has an existing shift assigned
steps.expectedResult: Employee is selected successfully

steps.action: Select a shift template that overlaps with the employee's existing shift time
steps.expectedResult: Shift template is selected

steps.action: Select the same date as the existing shift
steps.expectedResult: Date is selected

steps.action: Attempt to submit the assignment by clicking Submit or Assign button
steps.expectedResult: System displays conflict error message indicating overlapping shift detected and prevents the assignment from being saved

steps.action: Adjust the assignment to a non-overlapping time by selecting a different date or different shift template with non-overlapping hours
steps.expectedResult: System accepts the adjusted inputs without displaying any validation errors

steps.action: Submit the adjusted assignment
steps.expectedResult: Shift is assigned successfully and confirmation message is displayed

steps.action: Verify both shifts appear in the employee's schedule without conflicts
steps.expectedResult: Both the original and newly assigned shifts are visible in the schedule with no time overlaps

postconditions: Original shift assignment remains unchanged
New non-overlapping shift is successfully assigned
No overlapping shifts exist for the employee
Error handling for conflicts is validated

testCases.title: Bulk assign shift templates to multiple employees
preconditions: User is logged in with Scheduler role
Multiple employees (at least 3) exist in the system
At least one shift template is available
Selected employees have no conflicting shifts for the target date range
Bulk assignment feature is enabled and accessible

steps.action: Navigate to employee schedule assignment page with bulk assignment capability
steps.expectedResult: Bulk assignment form is displayed with multi-select employee dropdown, shift template selector, and date range picker

steps.action: Select multiple employees using the multi-select employee dropdown (select at least 3 employees)
steps.expectedResult: All selected employees are displayed in the selection list

steps.action: Select a shift template from the shift template dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Shift template is selected and shift details are displayed

steps.action: Specify a date range using the date range picker (e.g., 5 consecutive days)
steps.expectedResult: Date range is selected and displayed, bulk assignment form accepts all inputs without errors

steps.action: Click Submit or Assign button to submit the bulk assignment
steps.expectedResult: System processes the bulk assignment request and displays a progress indicator

steps.action: Wait for processing to complete
steps.expectedResult: System displays confirmation message indicating shifts have been assigned to all selected employees successfully, showing count of successful assignments

steps.action: Navigate to the first selected employee's schedule view
steps.expectedResult: Employee's schedule displays the assigned shifts for all dates in the specified range

steps.action: Navigate to the second selected employee's schedule view
steps.expectedResult: Employee's schedule displays the assigned shifts for all dates in the specified range

steps.action: Navigate to the third selected employee's schedule view and verify schedules
steps.expectedResult: Employee's schedule displays the assigned shifts for all dates in the specified range, all schedules reflect assigned shifts without conflicts

postconditions: Shift template is assigned to all selected employees for the specified date range
All assignments are saved in the EmployeeSchedules table
Each employee's schedule reflects the new shift assignments
No scheduling conflicts exist for any of the selected employees
Bulk assignment operation completed within performance requirements

storyTitle: As Scheduler, I want to handle bulk schedule assignments to achieve efficient workforce planning

testCases.title: Perform bulk assignment without conflicts
preconditions: User is logged in with Scheduler role
Multiple employees (at least 5) exist in the system
At least one shift template is available
None of the selected employees have existing shifts for the target date range
Bulk assignment endpoint POST /api/schedules/bulk is operational
System can handle batch processing for multiple employees

steps.action: Navigate to the bulk schedule assignment page
steps.expectedResult: Bulk assignment interface is displayed with employee multi-select, shift template selector, and date range fields

steps.action: Select multiple employees (at least 5) from the employee multi-select dropdown
steps.expectedResult: All selected employees are displayed in the selection list, selection is accepted without errors

steps.action: Select a shift template from the available shift templates dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Shift template is selected and template details (name, start time, end time) are displayed

steps.action: Specify a date range using the date range picker (e.g., 7 consecutive days)
steps.expectedResult: Date range is selected and displayed in the form

steps.action: Click Preview or Review button to view assignment summary
steps.expectedResult: System displays a summary showing all employees, selected shift template, date range, and total number of assignments to be created

steps.action: Review the summary for accuracy and click Submit or Confirm button to submit the bulk assignment
steps.expectedResult: System initiates batch processing, displays progress indicator, and processes all assignments

steps.action: Wait for bulk assignment processing to complete
steps.expectedResult: System displays success confirmation message indicating all assignments were saved successfully with count of total assignments created

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule view and select the first employee from the bulk assignment
steps.expectedResult: Employee's schedule is displayed showing all assigned shifts for the specified date range

steps.action: Verify the schedule details match the assigned shift template
steps.expectedResult: Shift times, dates, and template details match the bulk assignment parameters

steps.action: Repeat verification for at least 2 more employees from the bulk assignment
steps.expectedResult: All verified employee schedules reflect the assigned shifts correctly for the entire date range without any conflicts

postconditions: Shift template is assigned to all selected employees for the entire date range
All assignments are persisted in the database
Each employee's schedule displays the new assignments
No scheduling conflicts exist
Success confirmation is logged
Bulk assignment completed within acceptable performance timeframe

testCases.title: Detect conflicts during bulk assignment
preconditions: User is logged in with Scheduler role
Multiple employees exist in the system (at least 4)
At least one of the selected employees has an existing shift that will conflict with the bulk assignment
At least one shift template is available
Conflict detection mechanism is enabled
Bulk assignment page is accessible

steps.action: Navigate to the bulk schedule assignment page
steps.expectedResult: Bulk assignment interface is displayed

steps.action: Select multiple employees including at least one employee who has a conflicting schedule for the target date
steps.expectedResult: All employees are selected and displayed in the selection list, selection is accepted

steps.action: Select a shift template that will overlap with the existing shift of at least one selected employee
steps.expectedResult: Shift template is selected successfully

steps.action: Specify a date range that includes the date with the conflicting shift
steps.expectedResult: Date range is selected and displayed

steps.action: Click Preview or Review button to view assignment summary
steps.expectedResult: System displays summary of the bulk assignment

steps.action: Click Submit or Confirm button to submit the bulk assignment
steps.expectedResult: System validates all assignments and detects conflicts for affected employees

steps.action: Review the conflict report displayed by the system
steps.expectedResult: System reports conflicts clearly, displaying employee names, conflicting dates, and existing shift details for each affected employee. Assignment is not saved for employees with conflicts

steps.action: Adjust the selection by either removing the employee with conflicts or changing the date range to avoid conflicts
steps.expectedResult: Adjusted selection or date range is accepted by the system

steps.action: Click Submit or Confirm button to resubmit the adjusted bulk assignment
steps.expectedResult: System validates the adjusted assignment, finds no conflicts, and processes the bulk assignment

steps.action: Wait for processing to complete
steps.expectedResult: System displays success confirmation message indicating assignments were saved successfully for all employees without conflicts

steps.action: Verify schedules for the employees included in the final bulk assignment
steps.expectedResult: All verified employee schedules reflect the assigned shifts correctly without any conflicts

postconditions: Employees without conflicts have shifts successfully assigned
Employees with conflicts do not have conflicting shifts assigned
Conflict detection mechanism is validated
Error messages are clear and actionable
Final assignments are saved correctly in the database
System maintains data integrity by preventing overlapping shifts
